# iLovPDF

Free Online PDF & Image Editor | Privacy-First & Client-Side Tools
All processing happens 100% client-side. No files are uploaded to a server.

> [!IMPORTANT]
> This is a privacy-first web application where all sensitive operations (PDF editing, background removal, etc.) are performed locally in the browser using WebAssembly and Javascript.

## Core Capabilities

- **PDF Editing**: interactive rendering (PDF.js) + text layer overlay (Fabric.js).
- **Background Removal**: AI-powered subject extraction and compositing.
- **Conversion**: Image-to-PDF, PDF-to-Word (native extraction), etc.
- **Bulk Processing**: Efficient handling of multiple documents/images.

## Technical Architecture

- **Stack**: Vite + React + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS.
- **Framework**: Multi-page Application (MPA) with React-powered tool modules.
- **Mobile Optimized**: Responsive headers, balanced tool spacing, and zero-shift orientation logic.

## Key Files & Entry Points

- `index.html`: Main landing page with global tool discovery.
- `pdf-editor.html`: Advanced multi-page PDF editor (`src/components/tools/PdfEditorTool.tsx`).
- `background-remover.html`: AI-powered background remover (`src/components/tools/BackgroundRemoverTool.tsx`).
- `pdf-merge.html`: Join multiple PDF documents.
- `pdf-split.html`: extract pages or split PDFs.
- `pdf-compress.html`: Reduce PDF file size.
- `image-editor.html`: Standard image editing features.
- `image-resize.html`: Dimensions and file size optimization.
- `text-to-pdf.html`: Convert plain text or markdown to PDF.
- `llms.tsx`: Machine-readable React context for LLMs.

## Interaction Patterns

- **Viewport**: Custom panning/zooming logic with persistent zoom levels (Fit-to-Width priority).
- **Text Handling**: Support for both native PDF text editing and custom text layers.
- **Fluidity**: Real-time wheel/touch input with suppressed CSS transitions for zero-lag interaction.
